summary: A color scheme resembling the MS Visual C++ IDE
name: Visual-Cpp
description: A simple color scheme resembling the MS Visual C++ IDE, with maybe a little more highlighting (ie. constants).
install_details:
In Vim 6, simply copy this file into your "$VIMRUNTIME/colors/" or "$HOME/.vim/colors/", then use ":colorscheme oceandeep". Otherwise, just ":source" it.

The script might work fine in Vim 5.7 as well.
